Name: Disable-OdbcPerfCounter
Synopsis: Disables connection pooling Performance Monitor counters.

Name: Enable-OdbcPerfCounter
Synopsis: Enables connection pooling Performance Monitor counters.

Name: Enable-WdacBidTrace
Synopsis: Enables BidTrace for troubleshooting Windows DAC.

Name: Get-OdbcPerfCounter
Synopsis: Gets connection pooling Performance Monitor counters.

Name: Set-OdbcDriver
Synopsis: Configures the properties for installed ODBC drivers.

Name: Set-OdbcDsn
Synopsis: Configures properties for existing ODBC DSNs.
